Class BaseStorageDriver

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
StorageProvisioningDriver
Direct Known Subclasses:
EbsStorageDriver, OpenstackStorageDriver
public abstract class BaseStorageDriver
extends Object
implements StorageProvisioningDriver

an abstraction for a base storage driver to extend driver functionality.

adaml
